dict.acceptation: 自由主义者；自由党党员；
开明的；自由的；慷慨的；不拘泥的；

sent.orig: Meanwhile, based on Hayek's argument, this article distinguishes strictly British liberal tradition from French liberal tradition.
sent.trans: 同时，本文依据哈耶克的论述，严格界分了英国和法国两种自由传统。

sent.orig: It is in this sense that the liberal arts are liberal-as in liberare-to free.
sent.trans: 而这样的人完全能够掌控自己的人生或未来。

sent.orig: His Liberal liberal positions often cause caused him to clash with conservative lawmakers.
sent.trans: 他开明的地位，经常导致他与保守的立法者的冲突。

sent.orig: Their country's role in the EU as champion of liberal economic reform needs work.
sent.trans: 英国作为欧盟区自由经济改革的倡导者仍需努力。

sent.orig: Negroes and liberal whites were dismayed and reacted in various ways.
sent.trans: 黑人和自由主义白人感到惊愕，并作出各种反应。
